name: tdwg-theme
description: A Pelican theme for the TDWG website

scripts.copyjs:bootstrap: cp node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery.min.js static/js/jquery.min.js && cp node_modules/popper.js/dist/umd/popper.min.js static/js/popper.min.js && cp node_modules/bootstrap/dist/js/bootstrap.min.js static/js/bootstrap.min.js
scripts.build:js: npm run copyjs:custom && npm run copyjs:bootstrap
scripts.build:all: npm run build:css && npm run build:js
